forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this morning will give way to occasional showers during the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 16C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers this afternoon. Thunder possible. High 61F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clearing skies after some evening rain. Thunder is possible early. Low near 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain early...then becoming mostly clear overnight. Thunder is possible early. Low 41F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
